oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Atlas of the city of Nashville 1908. [Plate 04B ]
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1 map; 58 x 75 cm. A plat map of downtown Nashville, Tennessee, originally published in 1908 by G. M. Hopkins Company, showing the various buildings, landscapes, acreage, and street routes for several blocks. Original building structures and landmarks are depicted on the map, including Swifts Nashville Beef and Provision Company and a portion of the Sulphur Dell ballpark. This plat map is reproduced from the source: Atlas of the city of Nashville, Tennessee : from official records, private plans and actual surveys, G. M. Hopkins, [Philadelphia, Pa.]1908. Scale 100 feet to an inch. The original dimensions of the map, in the atlas publication: 15 ½ x 22 ¾ in. (i.e. 58 x 75 cm.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Swifts Nashville Beef and Provision Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Sulphur Dell (Nashville, Tenn.); Louisville and Nashville Railroad Company; Perry and Lester Stock Yard Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Howe Ice Company; Nashville Terminal Realty Company; Capitol Grain Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville Roofing and Paving Company; Nashville Chemical Company; Central Lumber Company (Nashville, Tenn.); N.J. Dodson and Company (Nashville, Tenn.); Brier Hill Collieries (Nashville, Tenn.); Nashville Gas Company
